scripts.updatePrimeVueVerion: echo 'VUE_APP_PRIMEVUE_VERSION=\c' >> .env.local ; npm ll -p --depth=0 primevue | grep -o '@.*' | sed '1s/^.//' >> .env.local
scripts.updateVueVerion: echo 'VUE_APP_VUE_VERSION=\c' >> .env.local ; npm ll -p --depth=0 vue | grep -o '@.*' | sed '1s/^.//' >> .env.local
scripts.resetLocalEnv: echo '' > .env.local; npm run updatePrimeVueVerion; npm run updateVueVerion
scripts.build: npm run resetLocalEnv; mkdir -p ../dist; rm -rf ../dist/static; vue-cli-service build --dest ../dist/static
